content: for there shall no more come into you
Shake yourself from the dust and arise;
loose the bonds from your neck,
For thus says the : “You were sold for nothing, and you shall be redeemed without money.”
For thus says the Lord : “My people went down at the first into Egypt to sojourn there, and the Assyrian oppressed them for nothing.
Now therefore what have I here,” declares the , “seeing that my people are taken away for nothing? Their rulers wail,” declares the , “and continually all the day my name is despised.
Therefore my people shall know my name. Therefore in that day they shall know that it is I who speak; here I am.”
He Was Pierced for Our Transgressions
Behold, my servant shall act wisely;
As many were astonished at you—
so shall he sprinkle many nations.
for that which has not been told them they see,
